channel.title: Unable to Reconnect when D/C 1.0.10d1
channel.description:
#### What happened?
In earlier versions (prior to 1.0.9c), I was able to reconnect upon very brief disconnect. Now I am kicked back to the start menu after several seconds. Basically this is making the game unplayable for me at this point, it has happened in over half my games. Still happening in 1.0.10d1... Please help!
#### What was SUPPOSED to happen?
Reconnecting to game.
#### Steps to reproduce:
Short period of disconnect, unable to reconnect to game in progress.
#### Comments:

item.title: Unable to Reconnect when D/C 1.0.10d1
item.dc:creator: grahfite
item.description:
Yeah, I’m having this problem too. My game crashes rather often now and i’ve no option at all to reconnect…

Read full topic

item.title: Unable to Reconnect when D/C 1.0.10d1
item.dc:creator: Moot
item.description:
What happened?

In earlier versions (prior to 1.0.9c), I was able to reconnect upon very brief disconnect. Now I am kicked back to the start menu after several seconds. Basically this is making the game unplayable for me at this point, it has happened in over half my games. Still happening in 1.0.10d1… Please help!

What was SUPPOSED to happen?

Reconnecting to game.

Steps to reproduce:
